alert.note: Alert for Livingston; St. John The Baptist; Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:50PM CDT until September 07 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East central Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Tangipahoa Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 450 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ponchatoula, or 8 miles south of Hammond, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Ponchatoula, Springfield, and Killian. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 11 and 27. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!

area.areaDesc: Livingston; St. John The Baptist; Tangipahoa
